nodes.text: Storthus was a desolate planet in the Churba sector of the Mid Rim. It was the homeworld of the giant stone eels, an indigenous species composed of living rock.
The PC video game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places the Churba Sector and, consequently, Storthus, in the Outer Rim.

Rebellion's in-game encyclopedia entry for Storthus names this planet as the home of "giant stone eels." This may be intended to be a reference to the giant exogorths, or space slugs, as seen in Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
